description: A team with 3 agents - a Web Surfer agent that can browse the web, a Verification Assistant that verifies and summarizes information, and a User Proxy that provides human feedback when needed.
label: Web Agent Team (Operator)_17419

participants.description: MultimodalWebSurfer is a multimodal agent that acts as a web surfer that can search the web and visit web pages.
participants.label: MultimodalWebSurfer

config.name: websurfer_agent

model_client.description: Chat completion client for OpenAI hosted models.
model_client.label: OpenAIChatCompletionClient

config.description: an agent that solves tasks by browsing the web

participants.description: An agent that provides assistance with tool use.
participants.label: AssistantAgent

config.name: assistant_agent

model_client.description: Chat completion client for OpenAI hosted models.
model_client.label: OpenAIChatCompletionClient

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.
model_context.label: UnboundedChatCompletionContext

config.description: an agent that verifies and summarizes information
config.system_message: You are a task verification assistant who is working with a web surfer agent to solve tasks. At each point, check if the task has been completed as requested by the user. If the websurfer_agent responds and the task has not yet been completed, respond with what is left to do and then say 'keep going'. If and only when the task has been completed, summarize and present a final answer that directly addresses the user task in detail and then respond with TERMINATE.

participants.description: An agent that can represent a human user through an input function.
participants.label: UserProxyAgent

config.name: user_proxy
config.description: a human user that should be consulted only when the assistant_agent is unable to verify the information provided by the websurfer_agent

model_client.description: Chat completion client for OpenAI hosted models.
model_client.label: OpenAIChatCompletionClient

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation after a maximum number of messages have been exchanged.
conditions.label: MaxMessageTermination

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation if a specific text is mentioned.
conditions.label: TextMentionTermination

config.selector_prompt:
You are the cordinator of role play game. The following roles are available:
{roles}. Given a task, the websurfer_agent will be tasked to address it by browsing the web and providing information.  The assistant_agent will be tasked with verifying the information provided by the websurfer_agent and summarizing the information to present a final answer to the user. If the task  needs assistance from a human user (e.g., providing feedback, preferences, or the task is stalled), you should select the user_proxy role to provide the necessary information.

Read the following conversation. Then select the next role from {participants} to play. Only return the role.

{history}

Read the above conversation. Then select the next role from {participants} to play. Only return the role.
